snippet.title: DRACOMATON - Steam Pre-Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist DRACOMATON on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2457890/DRACOMATON/

DRACOMATON is now available to wishlist on Steam! 

DRACOMATON is a top-down roguelike bullet hell about Eclipse, a small robot who awakens in an abandoned factory filled with corrupted training bots and the secrets of cosmic dragons. Fight your way to the top of the tower by transforming your robot body, changing your entire arsenal on the fly!

Thank you for all of your support as we've been preparing for release! We hope you're as excited as we are!!!

TWITTER:
https://twitter.com/gun_jumpers 
EMAIL:
gunjumpersjam@gmail.com
